attachments.title: How to Best Store and Access Credentials in Julia?
attachments.text: Hi all, I was recently stumped by something: Suppose I have some credentials I need to store to access a SQL DB. How should I best store these credentials for Julia to easily access? My current pattern is to use a combo of DataFrames.jl and CSV.jl like so: Create a credentials.csv like so: user pass lama 1234 Using CSV.jl and DataFrames.jl, read it into a DataFrame: using CSV using DataFrames f = CSV.File("credentials.csv") |> DataFrame; Parse and assign variables: USERNAME = f[1, :...
